title: DIPAM rejects PFC-REC debt resolution proposal for KSK Mahanadi project
description: DIPAM declined the debt resolution plan for KSK Mahanadi Power project by PFC and REC. NCLT paused sale in June 2022. Interested companies were NTPC Ltd, Vedanta Ltd, Adani Power Ltd, Jindal Power Ltd.
